title: Bitcoin Dominance Surge Masks Emerging Bear Market Signals
summary: Bitcoin dominance has reached a new cycle high while two critical indicators suggest broader market stress is emerging. Market liquidity is drying up and stablecoin flows are weakening as major buyers pull back, with key technical support levels now under threat.

title: Ethereum Breaks Below Critical $2,420 Support Level
summary: Ethereum is experiencing a significant correction after breaking below the anticipated $2,420 support level, unraveling under overleveraged futures positions. The shift from bullish to bearish trend follows the fading of initial ETF optimism documented in earlier June reports.
